description: Whether you want to look good or feel good, this men’s long-sleeved tee will do the trick. It’s designed with Merino wool and recycled polyester, for breathability, temperature regulation, and odor control. Plus, it’s constructed with flatlock offset shoulder and side seams to enhance comfort. With a subtle and colorful mountain design, this shirt offers just the right amount of flair.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Mountain Terrain LS Graphic Tee - Mens
